name: Drift & Race In City
description:
Drift & Race In City game is a thrilling and exciting super car racing game. Be the best car racer of fastest sports cars on the city streets . This amazing and realistic turbo car racing game is packed full of super cool and fast racing cars and difficult racing levels.In Drift & Race In City game you have to defeat other car racers and you must reach the finishing line before the other racers and become the champion of this race.

Drift & Race In City: Features

realistic car physics effect
A lot of high-end racing
shocking music and sound effects
Simple and smooth control
